title: No contributions, just cash
author: VD
content_html: I made the mistake of turning on Fox News for a few minutes and heard the hostess saying that the Red Cross would prefer that people not donate supplies, just cash, and that donating supplies would be “causing a problem”. What kind of scam are they running there? Based on some of the things I’ve heard of how the Red Cross abuses those it purports to help, I’m wondering if the organization has outlived its usefulness.
